definition: fortune telling based on the subject's face
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
surname Xiang
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
variant of 麵|面[mian4]
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: His works were deeply influenced by physiognomy and other theories elaborated by social darwinism.
sentences.chinese: 他受相面法和­社会达尔文主义的理论影响甚深。

sentences.english: Now, it is undergoing something of a revival.
sentences.chinese: 现在，相面术又有复苏的迹象。

sentences.english: Well wish to sister Chloe face reading in prison.
sentences.chinese: 颂恩如愿与妹妹可儿在狱中相面。

sentences.english: Kila Cheung says, "the facebook" try to use modern style to present the traditional chinese culture "physiognomic".
sentences.chinese: 尝试用现代风格呈现中国传统文化‘相面术’。

sentences.english: What does it mean for the four points given to Huang? Who knows?
sentences.chinese: 给黄嘉善相面的四个点是什么呢？我也不知道。

sentences.english: What was the meaning of these four points gaven by Mashan Fox to Huang Jiasan? I don't know.
sentences.chinese: 给黄嘉善相面的四个点是什么呢？我也不知道。

fortune telling
fortune-teller who uses the subject's face for his prognostication

to tell sb's fortune using divinatory trigrams

divination/fortune telling
arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc/supernatural arts (old)
geomancy
